column4: hello , i am using kubuntu 10.4 . I am facing a problem i have to set desktop resolution every time i login.
no idea how you would set a default, but at least if u figure out the command to do that you could add this to your startup session configuration
can you give me a quick hint i have tried  xrandr in rc.local
rc.local might not be appropiate, go to the startup-session programs in your gnome-session (preferences or administration menu, dont know)
